articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Feb. 8 Vinalon Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Feb. 8 Vinalon Complex
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the February 8 Vinalon Complex put on modern lines.
					 The workers of the complex and their helpers waged a dynamic drive for building a modern vinalon factory, completing a difficult and vast construction project in a matter of two years.
					
					 After being briefed on the factory before a huge map showing it, he looked round the vinyl acetate and polymerization shops and other places of the complex for hours to acquaint himself in detail with the construction and production there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the complex and their helpers have successfully wound up in a short span of time the huge project equivalent to the construction of a large chemical base by their own efforts and with their own technology in hearty response to the intention of the Party to develop the economy their own way and improve the people's standard of living by depending on the nation's economic foundation.
					
					 It is an astonishing miracle that the builders have constructed a precious structure of eternal value by their own efforts under so hard conditions by valiantly overcoming bottlenecks and difficulties lying in their way and dedicating their all to the project, he said. He extended high appreciation and thanks to them for having performed the laudable feats for the country and people.
					
					  Greatly pleased to watch for a long while vinalon being churned out from a spinning machine in an endless stream, he said with emotion that it has become possible to supply more vinalon fabric to the people and realize the lifelong wish of President Kim Il Sung at last.
					
					 The workers of the DPRK were the vanguard fighters who worked heart and soul, thinking only of the interests of the revolution during its arduous periods including those of the postwar rehabilitation and construction and the building of the foundations of socialism, he noted, calling for always living and struggling in the same spirit as displayed by them when building a paradise for the people from scratch.
					
					 Noting that the complex has a very important duty and role to perform as it is the one directly linked with the people's life, he advanced the important tasks to be fulfilled by it.
					
					 He underscored the need for the complex to deepen the scientific researches into the production of varieties of chemical goods from the vinalon intermediate field and, at the same time, round off the aromatic compound production process to further strengthen the Juche character of chemical industry.
					
					 Vinalon and fertilizer are very important for solving the issues of people's food and clothing, he said, calling upon the officials, workers and technicians of the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex to keep their production going at a high rate and pay deep attention to the work to develop their complexes under a long-term plan, deeply aware of their missions.
					
					 He had a photo session with the labor innovators who have made great contribution to the building of the vinalon factory.
					
					 He was accompanied by Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang, Ri Jae Il and Jon Il Chun, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK and Chinese Party Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK and Chinese Party Delegations
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here Sunday between the delegations of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Department Director Kim Yong Il and other officials of the department and from the Chinese side were the members of the delegation led by Head Wang Jiarui and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on boosting the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and countries and on matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Reception Given for Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for Chinese Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on Saturday.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the delegation led by Head Wang Jiarui, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming and staff member of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were Department Director Kim Yong Il and other officials of the department. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit Chongsan-ri
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit Chongsan-ri
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of working people's organizations and members of the Cabinet Sunday visited Chongsan-ri, Kangso District on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of Chongsan-ri spirit and method initiated by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The visitors laid bouquets before the statue of the President in Chongsan-ri and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Then they looked round the monument to the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and visited the revolutionary museum in Chongsan-ri.
					
					 There are in the museum historic materials showing the leadership feats of the President who set a shining example in creating a revolutionary work method during his field guidance to Chongsan-ri and Kangso County for half a month in February Juche 49 (1960).
					
					 He visited farmers' houses to learn in detail about the conditions of their living and had talks and meetings with officials there to comprehensively clarify the method of party, administration and economic work.

articles.title: General Advance Called for
articles.content:
General Advance Called for
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Sunday editorially call upon all the people of the DPRK to vigorously launch the general offensive to thoroughly implement the joint calls issued by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of its 65th birthday, rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il and thus brilliantly decorate this year as a year of great change to be specially recorded in the history of the country and a year of prosperity in which people fully enjoy happiness.
					 The joint calls comprehensively clarify militant tasks for glorifying this year as a year of great change worthy of special record in the history of the WPK and the country and loudly proclaiming the advent of a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 The basic spirit consistent in the joint calls is to wage a strenuous drive for the final victory once again on the basis of last year's shining successes which brought about a decisive change in the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation and thus effect a great change in improving the people's standard of living this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the WPK and open up a bright prospect for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 When the entire army and all the party members and other working people thoroughly carry out their militant tasks set forth in the joint calls, they can demonstrate their honor as genuine soldiers and disciples who bring all the ideals of their leader into reality and the DPRK will shine forever as the country of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 No trials can stop the advance of the DPRK people who carry forward the invincible faith and indomitable revolutionary spirit of Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu, and march forward keeping pace with his forced march.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for waging vigorous struggle by giving the fullest play to the boundless loyalty for the Party, a great guide, and thus glorify the 65th anniversary of the WPK as a great revolutionary and auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of Kim Il Sung's nation.

articles.title: Replacement of AA by Peace Treaty Urged
articles.content:
Replacement of AA by Peace Treaty Urged
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula has now become an acute hotspot where a war may break out any moment. It is an urgent requirement of the times to replace the outdated Armistice Agreement (AA) by a peace treaty. This is attributable to the fact that the AA has now become defunct and the Korean Peninsula turned into a theater of acute military stand-off and a dangerous nidus of a war due to the United States.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present AA would not make it possible to prevent the eruption of military conflicts by any incidental cause.
					
					 An early conclusion of a peace treaty replacing the AA would help turn the relations of acute belligerency into those of peace and confidence.
					
					 The long ceasefire on the Korean Peninsula unprecedented in the world history of ceasefire is just like a time-bomb in work that poses constant threat to Northeast Asia and furthermore, Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Peace treaty only would bring peaceful environment to the peninsula and the rest of Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The urgency for replacing the AA with a peace treaty is also related to the main trend of the present times toward reconciliation, cooperation and development, not war and confrontation.
					
					 The issue of concluding a peace treaty would see a smooth solution if the U.S. comes out with the political will to make a bold switchover in its hostile policy toward the DPRK in conformity with its interests and the desire of the world peace-loving people, facing up to the changed situation and trend of the developing history.
					
					 The U.S. had better make a bold decision at once to fulfill the duty it assumes in replacing the AA with a peace treaty.
					
					 Steadfast is the stand of the DPRK to establish a durable peace regime on the Korean Peninsula and denuclearize it through dialogue and negotiations, the article concludes.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Supported in S. Korea
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Supported in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a special resolution to significantly celebrate the 10th anniversary of the publication of the north-south joint declaration on Feb. 4.
					 The resolution referred to the significance of holding joint function of the nation, involving Koreans from the south and the north and overseas, on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication. It urged to make the function an event for the grand national unity by which all Koreans become one in the efforts for peace and reunification.
					
					 They would form a preparatory committee for the joint national function to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication made up of various political parties, organizations and individuals in south Korea with the organization as its core, the resolution noted, and went on:
					
					 They will sponsor an all-people meeting and an exhibition for peace and reunification, a seminar and other events and actively push ahead with the work to arouse the masses to the reunification movement on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					 The organization will work hard to escalate the movement for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and peace on the Korean Peninsula and reinvigorate visits, contacts and multi-lateral cooperation between the south and the north.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with DPRK Embassies Held in China
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with DPRK Embassies Held in China
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Foreign Ministry held a friendly meeting with staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Friday on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Choe Jin Su and staff members of the DPRK embassy.
					
					 Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister, and other officials of the ministry were on hand.
					
					 The attendants recalled that last year the relations between the two countries in the field of diplomacy became closer and exchange and cooperation brisk in different fields through successful events for "year of friendship" on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of bilateral diplomatic ties.
					
					 And they talked to each other about the matter of further developing the bilateral relations as intended by the supreme leaders of the two countries in the new year, too.

articles.title: Elimination of Anti-Reunification Forces Called for
articles.content:
Elimination of Anti-Reunification Forces Called for
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany and the European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a joint appeal under the title "Let us bring down the treacherous and sycophantic regime against reunification in the spirit of 'By our nation itself'" on Feb. 4.
					 The appeal recalled that the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration called on all the Koreans to adorn this year which marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the north-south joint declaration as a year of a new phase in independent reunification and a year of a turning point in flinging open the gate to national reunification.
					
					 The decade since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration proved that a key to the victory of the Korean nation lies in the idea of "By our nation itself", banner of the great national unity, it said.
					
					It accused the south Korean authorities which stake their fate on outsiders of doggedly pursuing the policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen as evidenced by watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and resorting to dangerous military provocations in order to totally negate the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and stand in the way of national reunification.
					
					 It called upon all political parties and social organizations as well as workers, farmers, youth and students and religionists supporting the inter-Korean declarations to wage shoulder to shoulder and in single mind the sacred struggle to wipe out anti-reunification and sycophantic traitors, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported in Brazil
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported in Brazil
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK issued a statement on Feb. 2 in support of the statement of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					 The statement said it is absolutely legitimate and logically proper that the DPRK, through the statement of its Foreign Ministry, recently proposed the parties concerned to the Armistice Agreement to start the talks for replacing the AA with a peace treaty as soon as possible.
					
					 The DPRK government has constantly made every possible effort to ensure peace, security and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia true to the behests of President
						 Kim Il Sung, it noted.
					
					 The present situation of the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity proves that a key to solving the issue is to put an end to the state of war, the main source of the hostile relationship between the DPRK and the U.S., it said, adding that the urgent task is to conclude a peace treaty and this is a main link for solving all the pending issues.
					
					 It urged the parties concerned to the AA to immediately respond to the proposal of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in India and Pakistan and a photo exhibition and a film show in Singapore between Jan. 26 and 30 on the occasion of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 Exhibited at their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their undying feats and books introducing the validity and vitality of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and the advantages of the DPRK socialist system.
					
					 At a joint seminar of Indian Juche idea study organizations speakers said that February 16 is an auspicious holiday not only of the Korean people but also of the world's progressive people and the Juche idea followers aspiring after global peace and independence.
					
					 They highly praised the immortal feats of Kim Jong Il, saying that he is successfully carrying forward to completion the cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people are rallied as one in one idea around Kim Jong Il, they stressed that this single-minded unity can not be found in any other part of the world and it is more powerful than a nuke.
					
					 They stated that it is evidently the self-defensive step for peace of the Korean Peninsula that the DPRK has bolstered up its war deterrent under the banner of Songun. And they expressed full support for the DPRK's proposal for starting at an early date this year the talks on replacement of the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					The chief of a Pakistani organization for the study of the Juche idea said at the seminar that
						 Kim Jong Il has defended the dignity of the independent Korean people by turning the DPRK into a military power able to defeat any imperialist aggression forces with his prominent Songun revolutionary leadership admired by the world.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in India.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was Korean film "Great Honor and Happiness of Nation."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung released its bulletin on Feb. 1 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who successfully realized the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President" said that the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President has been successfully realized in the DPRK by Kim Jong Il who has personified loyalty to the President on the highest level.
					
					 The institution of the Juche year and the Day of the Sun and the adoption of the Kim Il Sung Constitution, which codified that Kim Il Sung is the eternal President of the DPRK, made the Korean people and the world revolutionaries cherish the firm faith that the President is always alive as the sun of mankind, it said, and went on:
					
					 Everywhere you go in the DPRK, you can see the tower of immortality bearing the slogan "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" set forth by Kim Jong Il, which is perfect in an architectural aspect.
					
					 Kim Jong Il set forth the slogan "Let Us Arm Ourselves Firmly with the Revolutionary Ideas of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung!" and authored a large number of works including "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" to develop in depth the revolutionary idea of the President and firmly defend its purity.
					
					 Korean-style socialism associated with the whole life of the President is winning one victory after another under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Officials Should Become Genuine Servants Dedicating Themselves to the People" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Russia.
					 The work, published on Oct. 28, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the need for all the officials to become genuine servants for the people who are called as "our officials" and the tasks to do so.
